MONL.content: break with tradition, uprooting, amnesia w/out recourse: all of these unleash the genealogical drive, the desire of the idiom, impulse to anamnesis, destructive love of the interdict, tattooing of all colors on the body [see AF p. 10 erogenous color draws mask]
madness of a hypermnesia, a supplement of loyalty, commit to traces of writing: toward an anamnesis of the entirely other > this is the most difficult thing [Aristotle says same about virtue]

MSUBJ.content: grammar & etymology of forcener > lose one’s sense, beyond sense, without sense, hors sens (fors and sen) > can’t forcener un subjectile in French w/out forcing the grammar: corresponds w/ German Wahnsinnige (without sense) not Geisteskrank (mental illness) [Sinnan originally means to travel, stretch towards; Indo-European sent and set mean path]
forcené: for, fort, force, for, and né, letting or, hors, sort incubate in it

PP.content: pharmakon also means paint, an artificial tint, a chemical dye that imitates chromatic scale given in nature

PAS.content: in a moment of extreme, precipitous virtuosity, where o (mort, fors, faux, faut, zéro, mot) resonates everywhere and nom turns to mon, Derrida asks himself if his policing overzealousness [to unmask the absence of the name, le pas-de-nom] deciphers identities [maur/chot, m’: o], wants to catch everything in a dragnet (filet)

F.content: wolf, Wolkenkratzer (skyscraper), Grateloup (scrapewolf), sounds gr, kr, skr: quasi-synonyms, quasi-homonyms w/out privileging either signifier or signified (linguistic “motivations”?)

DS.content: opposition btwn metaphor & metonymy is purely semantic—deconstructed by superficial, profound, that is abyssal operation of versification (vers, vers—sens—vers, versus, verre), morcelante et reconstituante (hiver, pervers, envers, travers, vertige, rêve)

P.content: for Kant, pure sound & pure color as vibration of ether > purely formal, “universally compatible w/ certainty”—beautiful [what about color gold on frame?]

+R.content: resonances leading you astray, what if I like words in order to be-tray (pour trahir) > (pour traiter, triturer, traîner, tramer, tracer, traquer)

gl of “angle”: wild, almost unnarratable event, not a morpheme, close to piercing (trouer) a hole in the arthron [articulation, joint], patch of color in graphesis, the trait in color, a rebel to appeased commerce (regulated exchange of 2 elements [lexical, pictural])

[on a tr spree]: not a formal program, not a material matrix, neither metaphor nor metonymy: a system of traits, this truncated matrix lacks nothing for affecting déjà [Derrida], for inciting to all transferences
trance or tragedy of Ich, trembler [tréma, treachery, trunks, transpierce, trepannings]
tr as chromatic, color transforms program by leaving law of trait in tact

this [chromatic] tr, which works inside & outside language, is not logocentrism, not a consecration of analogy, not a hypercratylean theory of language: what’s at stake is violence & the arbitrary > it breaches (fraye) an entirely different body

C.content: feu (sur) le paradigme [TN. fire on the paradigm, late paradigm], fuit, il-fût > suicide paradigm, retrac(t)ing by blowing itself up

E.content: for Kant, colors, which are generally adornments, are affiliated w/ moral qualities (i.e. red–sublimity, violet–tenderness)

LG.content: genre-clause (clause de genre): clin d’oeil, écluse (floodgate), clôture qui s’exclut de ce qu’elle inclut, déclasse ce qu’elle permet de classer > unfigurable figure of clusion, forme sans forme, neither sees day nor brings itself to light

CIN.content: btwn black & white, color of writing resembles only “literality” of cinder that still inheres in a language

OG.content: harmony, chromatics, calculation; analogy btwn painting & music is analogy itself
